mapper.insert:
insert into t_sys_mpos_info ( manager_id, sn, account_id,
mer_id,
mer_name,
cash_back_type, cash_back_condition,cash_back_money,credit_card_rate, cloud_flash_rate, create_by, cre_date, cre_time) values ( #{manager_id}, #{sn}, #{account_id},
#{mer_id},
#{mer_name},
#{cash_back_type}, #{cash_back_condition},#{cash_back_money},#{credit_card_rate}, #{cloud_flash_rate}, #{create_by}, #{cre_date}, #{cre_time})
mapper.delete: delete from t_sys_mpos_info where id=#{map.pos_id} AND manager_id=#{map.manager_id} and dis_status=#{map.dis_status}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.manager_id, t.sn, t.mer_id, t.mer_name, t.name, t.tel, t.cash_back_type, t.cash_back_condition, t.cash_back_money, t.real_cash_back_money, t.cash_back_status, t.credit_card_rate, t.cloud_flash_rate, t.act_status, t.dis_status, t.act_user_id, t.account_id, t.remark, t.create_by, t.update_by, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(t.act_date, t.act_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS act_date, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(t.cre_date, t.cre_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS cre_date, DATE_FORMAT( STR_TO_DATE( CONCAT(t.up_date, t.up_time), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s' ), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS up_date, t1.app_id FROM t_sys_mpos_info t LEFT JOIN sys_user_account t1 ON t.account_id = t1.id where t.sn=#{sn}
